lenders.occupational_info: I help people feel better in their body, mind and spirit.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I like the way these loans help people to be independent and help themselves, giving support when its needed.  I know Heather would like this too.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: It’s a way of proving that we can make our world a better place if we want to, and that people stills being concerned about what happens to the others.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I saw Kiva featured on Frontline/World and I felt compelled to do something.

lenders.name: Will

lenders.occupational_info: Website Design and Development

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I know money isn't the meaning of life, but it can do lots of good at the right moment in time.

I'm currently involved in a meeting space, a publisher, a school for social entrepreneurs and a consulting practice.

lenders.name: Liz and Anthony
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea that our money goes straight to the places where it can make a difference, and we like to read the stories of those who have benefited from loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
Liz works in training - teaching business people from many different backgrounds how to be more creative and innovative in their work (and to enjoy it more too!). 
Anthony works in scientific measurement and metrology, researching and creating new machines and technologies that will allow the world to measure lengths more accurately.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I should

lenders.name: Travis

lenders.name: wendy
lenders.loan_because: It's humbling to know that a relatively small donation or assistance of any kind can change a persons life, starting with providing HOPE.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: I went to Togo many years ago when I visited my brother who was in the Peace Corps at the time. I am so impressed by women in developing countries who are able to overcome every day obstacles and pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Sage

lenders.occupational_info: Technology Sales

lenders.name: Raymond

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the interdependent web of life.

lenders.name: Jacqueline

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: i want to help

lenders.name: Partena
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all individuals should be provided with the opportunity to pursue their dreams!

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping strong, resourceful, courageous women who are trying to better their own circumstances.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a loan sometime.
lenders.occupational_info: designing the buildings that we live in and around.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: I believe you need to give back what you receive. I have been fortunate in this life and want to give others who have the desire to succeed the chance to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit agency in Seattle. We serve many people who need a chance to become self sufficient. I believe their situations are temporary and they can move forward in their life with a little help.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want people worldwide to have a life of dignity and sustainability.  The only way to achieve this in the long-term is to give the people the ability to produce income on their own.  I am happy to help people achieve that goal.  I am the stirrup to help people mount up into the saddle.  Once there, they hold the reins and control their horse.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: This gives me joy!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired.  I have been self-employed most of my life.  I support others who want to be self-employed and enourage them to take the weekends off.

lenders.name: Tone
lenders.loan_because: It feels right and good to give people an opportunity to succeed so they can have a better life. And we can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Lizzy Farrell

I like people who want to help themselves, their families, and their communities, and I want to decrease world suck. Nerdfighters FTW! (do I mean For The Win or French The Llama? you'll never know)
Best wishes and DFTBA!

lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who have a definite plan.

lenders.name: Armando

lenders.occupational_info: Father helps hospitals in America run more efficiently.  Mother focuses on raising the children.

lenders.name: Hansi
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people in need!

I´m an actress since my childhood.

lenders.name: j.w.
lenders.loan_because: James 1:27

lenders.name: Breanna
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to support others who are working to make a better life for themselves and enrich their local community/economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently at home raising my daughters.

lenders.name: B & B
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great organization. For such small amounts, we can help people make a living or realize a dream.

lenders.name: The Cottages on the Key
lenders.loan_because:
THE  KIVA TORCH

When asked if we could lend a hand
          To others with a need
   The choice to help the Kiva way
            Became a gift indeed

But soon we'd learn the greater gift
           Was given unto "we"
From all who sought their funding needs
         Yet asked for nothing free

For each a story filled with hope
     Our chance to change a life
A small amount to reach one's dream
        To rise above their strife

The gift we send that holds the flame
          Which lights prosperity
  To one in need who soon returns
       The brightened flame to "we"

And basking in its' warmth and glow
      Now others changed for good
 Their joy, their pride, their gift to us
        This Torch for greater good

And on we hope to pass this Torch
          Again and yet again
    To all who pass within its’ light
      It's gift we’ll each retain

       Roger Van Wie, Kiva Lender
        For "HomeAway Cottages"
                             2010
lenders.occupational_info: Vacation Rentals

lenders.name: Fabiola
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an online writer for CBCNews.ca

lenders.name: ruth

lenders.name: Brandi and Ryan Urie

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I saw the need firsthand during my travels.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently take care of the elderly in a nursing home.  I help them with activities that they can't do themselves.

lenders.name: Jess

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a technology company.  Someday I would like to operate a small business.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a sustainable way to address poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I am constantly trying to learn more about  Latin America and poverty

lenders.name: Harley Sears
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Mei
lenders.loan_because: I can.  If I can do something to help, then why not?

lenders.loan_because:
I believe the resources people have isn't always acompanied with money. So in order for people to be able to take advantage of there resources they need a little financial help. 

Recourceful people is what makes the world go around, so lending those people money will better a global situation.

In general I believe that people do NOT have to be poor for others to be rich.

lenders.name: Nemo
lenders.loan_because:
Proverbs 19:17 - He who has pity on the poor gives to the Lord, and the Lord will give him his reward.

And why on this way:
Exodus 22:25 - If you let any of the poor among my people have the use of your money, do not be a hard creditor to him, and do not take interest.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in them..

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I have food, shelter, a job and a good family and can share some of what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: Customer service, helping families, friends and communities to feed one another by providing superior seeds, tools, information and service

lenders.name: Fabi
lenders.loan_because: lending money is about trusting people and believing in their abilities. This is the human side of Microfinance and the reason why I have been fascinated by the topic for many years.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being connected to other people around the world and to affect their lives in a positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to represent the state in appeals from criminal convictions.  It is important to have a fair criminal justice system and I am a part of that process.

lenders.loan_because: People who desire positive change need a vehicle to expedite that change.  Our loans fuel that vehicle.

lenders.name: Francesca
lenders.loan_because: If you see a hungry man don't give him rice: teach to cultivate

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: The Godfather told me to.

lenders.name: Caspian Kabob

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others make a better life

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.occupation: nonprofit for the arts and environment

lenders.name: Gary X
lenders.loan_because: I know I can help people directly, rather than anonymously via a large charitable agency. It's nothing to add $25 to my account whenever I can and put that money to work making someone else's life a little better...
lenders.occupational_info: I create and design artwork/communications for printing and web sites for the worldwide web.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Got motivated after reading God Wants You To Be Rich by Paul Zane Pilzer.
lenders.occupational_info: Real estate company.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I have learned that whatever I have is enough, and no matter how little or how much I give, still there is enough. Making this loan is a small way of expressing gratitude for my many blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired educator. For over thirty years I was privileged to work with children as their school librarian. In that capacity I was charged with providing materials to support and enrich the curriculum and to introducing students to a variety of resources for information  My personal goal was to instill in each child the pleasures found in reading books.

lenders.name: MANISH
lenders.loan_because: I HAVE STARTED MY OWN BUSINESS OF WEBSITE, WHICH IS A PROPERTY PORTAL NAME INDIASPROPERTUGURU.COM, I HAVE ALREADY INVESTED SOME AMOUNT BUT NEED SOME MORE MONEY FOR THE BETTERMENT OF THE SAME.
lenders.occupational_info: AS INDIA IS GROWING AND INDIAN ECONOMY AND INFRASTURE IS ALSO GROWING, SO THE SCOPE AND POTENTIAL IS HUGE IN PROPERTY PORTAL.

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.loan_because:
i barely use the money i have! So why not give it to hardworking people who deserve it? Kiva is my new piggy bank...don't need a bank account anymore!  
I usually dumpster dive...thrift shop, work for food and a place to stay, and barter with friends. my lifestyle allows me to give, and i'm so happy to find a place where i can make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I am majoring in earth science/geography with a sustainability concentration. When i'm not at school...i'm working a few part time jobs, or hanging out and volunteering at a local sustainable/organic farm. I love music, dancing, reading and DIY projects. I have a garden.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: the stories I read impact my life.  A small loan is such an easy way to (hopefully) mirror that impact back to its source.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the development of language and speech disorders.

lenders.name: Maarten
lenders.loan_because: Why not view the world as a global village where neighbours help each other out? There's enough food and resources for everyone... let's share!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse and work with people who are physically and mentally handicapped.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: of Muhammad Yunus

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good forture and like to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Drexden

lenders.occupational_info: I help people live happier lives.

lenders.name: www.1og0.com

lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world." -- Gandhi

lenders.name: Ganesh & Vinitha

lenders.occupational_info: Developing software applications that will help simplify work.

lenders.name: PabloBM

lenders.name: Toine
lenders.loan_because: I believe that true improvement comes from seting up business and improving local infrastructure through the people themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for companies that need temporary support. For example managing a project or a department.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with so much, and I have it through entrepreneurial hard work and dedication.  This cause is dedicated to helping those who have taken the steps to help themselves rise above in their part of the world.

lenders.name: DresserTop Foundation
lenders.loan_because: We add up all of our pocket change periodically and use it to help people grow their businesses and better support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family who wants to help other families. My husband and I want our kids to see even small amounts of giving can reap big rewards around the world. We support people who have ideas of how to rise up out of poverty.

lenders.name: Ed Cook
lenders.occupational_info: I work and study at Australia's top business school.  I advise students looking to develop careers in Management Consulting.  I'm also half way through studying for an MBA.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I believe that poverty can be significantly reduced in the next 20 years, but takes individuals to take the steps necessary for it to happen.

lenders.name: William Griggs
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info:
William Griggs is an interactive consultant and entrepreneur from Nashville, Tennessee. He is a graduate of Emory & Henry College and Brentwood Academy preparatory school.

Over the past 4 years, William has worked with CentreSource, Spheris, Inc., the Tennessee Bun Company,  My College Road Trip and Suineg Consulting.

Currently, William is in the process of starting giveyear, a social enterprise he is incubating in the Nashville Entrepreneur Center that seeks to change the world by harnessing the talents of our nation's most promising future leaders and providing them with an opportunity to serve.

In addition to his interactive work, William is a dog lover, avid reader, and a dreamer
